drag-and-drop-v2.question_text:
This example is pretty ugly, as it is more for technical testing than for showing features.

This is the question text. Below the draggables are three zones: Red, Green, and Blue. There are also some intersecting black lines that you can use for testing how well the draggables hold their center position once dropped onto the image.

If you are in the LMS, you can view the responsive view of this XBlock.
